description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Fred George - Early Adopter of OO & Agile, Advocating MicroServices & Programmer Anarchy
Rod Johnson - CEO of Atomist, Creator of Spring, Independent Investor, Author & Coder
Jessica Kerr - Polyglot Functional Developer
Michael Nygard - Author of "Release It!" & GOTO Chicago Program Committee Member
Sam Newman - Author of "Building Microservices" & GOTO Chicago PC Member

Download slides here:
http://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/Microservices%20Panel

https://twitter.com/gotochgo
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Microservice Panel • F. George, R. Johnson, J. Kerr, M. Nygard & S. Newman
